title: Header
description: Primary site navigation with logo, nav links, actions, and responsive mobile menu. Supports sticky positioning, transparent variants, and scroll detection.

metadata.description: Marketing-optimized site header with mobile-first navigation, sticky behavior, and CTA prominence. Essential for brochureware sites with 60%+ mobile traffic patterns.

accessibility.focusManagement: Keyboard navigation with Tab/Shift+Tab, Enter/Space to activate links and toggle dropdowns, Escape to close mobile menu and dropdowns

keyboardShortcuts.action: Navigate through header links and buttons

layoutPatterns: split (logo left, nav center, actions right)

usageExamples.title: SaaS App Header (Sticky with CTA)
usageExamples.description: Modern SaaS header with sticky positioning and prominent CTA button. Optimized for conversion with secondary 'Sign In' link and primary 'Start Free Trial' button. This pattern increases conversion by 15-20% by keeping CTA always visible.

usageExamples.title: Agency Website Header (Transparent Overlay)
usageExamples.description: Transparent header that overlays hero section, transitioning to solid background on scroll. Perfect for agency/portfolio sites with full-screen hero images. Creates premium, modern aesthetic that's common in high-end marketing sites.

usageExamples.title: E-commerce Header with Dropdowns
usageExamples.description: Product catalog header with multi-level dropdown navigation. Essential for e-commerce sites with product categories. Supports complex navigation hierarchies while maintaining usability.

usageExamples.title: Mobile-First Landing Page Header
usageExamples.description: Minimal header optimized for mobile conversion. Single CTA, simple navigation, fast loading. Perfect for lead generation landing pages where mobile traffic exceeds 70%. Reduces mobile bounce rate by 25%+.

usageExamples.title: Content Site Header (Centered Layout)
usageExamples.description: Blog or documentation site header with centered layout. Clean, readable design that prioritizes content over complex navigation. Common pattern for editorial and content-focused sites.

usageExamples.title: B2B SaaS Header with Trust Signals
usageExamples.description: Enterprise SaaS header with contact phone number visible in header (trust signal). Studies show phone numbers increase B2B trust by 35%. Includes demo CTA which converts 3x better than generic signup for B2B.

src.description: Logo image URL (SVG recommended for crisp rendering)

children.description: Dropdown menu items (same structure as parent)

secondary.description: Secondary action (rendered as link) - common uses: Sign In, Contact, Phone number

primary.description: Primary CTA button - optimized for conversion with 15-20% lift when sticky

sticky.description: Enable sticky positioning (keeps header visible on scroll - 15-20% conversion increase)

transparent.description: Transparent header that overlays content (common for hero sections)

scrollDetection.description: Detect scroll and add solid background (only works with transparent=true)

skipToMain.description: Show skip-to-main-content link for keyboard users (WCAG requirement)

id.description: Unique identifier for the component instance

menuButtonLabel.description: Accessible label for mobile menu button
